tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: (2/2) Reports like these served as notices for mariners, and @StateDept utilized this info to apprise merchant ships about…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: (2/2) Reports like these served as notices for mariners, and @StateDept utilized this info to apprise merchant ships about which ports to avoid. U.S. officials also negotiated w/ foreign governments when they banned entry of U.S. vessels as a preventative measure. #FSIatHome
